Is there anyone has Adobe Muse crack for MAC?
Adobe Muse 4.0 is out. Can you apply your crack to that as well? I tried it and it didn't work.

Works Perfect and is update-able. Instructions are for MAC but its almost the same for Windows Users.

1. Install Abode Muse, Making sure you uncheck the automatic start after installation.

2. Update to the latest Version. After programs updates and installs- CLOSE the Program.

3.Go to folder Contents: C:Program Files (x86)Adobe Muse and copy & Replace MuseOnAIR

4. If you don't have an abode account- Create one.

5. Create Adobe account:
https://www.adobe.com/account/sign-in.adobedotcom.html

6. Run Adobe Muse and select 'Try Adobe Muse for free'.

7. Sign-in with the account you have created.

8. Accept the License Agreement and use Adobe ID for finish activation.

9. Enjoy!

this is a great program, but do you have the most updated version? They updated alot of the features. Including using background images instead of just a solid color or gradient fill. Id appreciate it!
